name: Diecast
description:
! Use WASD + Space to navigate menus (kinda weird I know) !

Diecast is a (somewhat) roguelike shoot'em'up where your weapons abilities are determined by the cast of the dice.

The game was made in 48 hours, and as such, is still very much in development. Bugs are inevitable and to be expected.

-- Controls --

W,A,S,D - Move / Navigate UI

Space - Navigate UI

Mouse - Aim / Shoot

-- Features --

- 15 Rooms

-  19 Unique Dice Abilities

- Frogs

- 3 Bosses

- 5 Unique Dice Curses

The entirety of this game was made by me in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam for 2022, following the theme: "Roll Of The Dice"

The music used is copyight free and made by rob0ne

https://rob0ne.bandcamp.com/album/digital-odyssey
